      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor)
        Colors are standard Android color ints. In Android, colors are represented as packed ints, made up of 4 bytes: alpha, red, green, blue. The values are unpremultiplied, meaning any transparency is stored solely in the alpha component, and not in the color components. See http://developer.android.com/reference/android/graphics/Color.html for more information.
        Specified by:
        setBackgroundColor in interface IInAppMessage
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - See http://developer.android.com/reference/android/graphics/Color.html.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
